entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who is handing Harry a special quill.

entities.name: quill
entities.description: A long, thin black quill with an unusually sharp point given to Harry by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: parchment
entities.description: A stack of papers that look like essays for marking on Professor Umbridge's desk.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge gives Harry a special quill.
Harry uses the special quill given to him by Professor Umbridge.
